title: Central High School absences and grade point average

content.description: Central High School keeps a database of information about each student, including the numeric variables numberOfAbsences and gradePointAverage. The expression below is used to determine whether a student is eligible to receive an academic award.
content.question: (numberOfAbsences â‰¤ 5) AND (gradePointAverage > 3.5)Which of the following pairs of values indicates that a student is eligible to receive an academic award?

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
